questions.text: Marvel's parents and school counselor call her worries "anxiety." What does Marvel call her worries?

questions.answer: She freezes and gets carried off stage

questions.text: who is Skippy?
who says "Sometimes life gives us more roadblocks than freeways"?

questions.answer: On the sports field surrounded by a group of 8th graders

questions.text: what does Marvel yell to get the 8th graders away from the baby goat?
questions.answer: Run! Principal Huxx is coming. Principal Huxx is coming

questions.text: what grade is Reef in?

who goes to a principal/parent/teacher meeting when Marvel's mom is working?

questions.answer: Texting or hearing news that her sister had a baby

questions.text: what 2 things does Marvel and Reef's mom say are not allowed at the table?
what food does Marvel use to train Butter to walk on a leash?
who or what does Marvel meet at the pet store that introduces her to the idea of therapy animals?
questions.answer: Sonny the Newfoundland Dog / a Therapy dog

questions.answer: Because Butter is eating the test papers

questions.text: how does Mercedes replace Butter in the school play?
questions.answer: She has her little brother dress up as a Goat

questions.text: how does Marvel get to the farm to see Butter when she's sick?
